bwwExcerpt: Utah is blessed to see American Idol winner Nick Fradiani, who was Will Swenson’s first replacement in the role on Broadway, as Neil – Then. His robust voice, impressive in its own right, wonderfully encapsulates Diamond’s iconic vocals.
